title: Three Putti, studies for the Painting, "Callisto"
provenance:
Giovannie Piancastelli; Edward Brandegee
Mary Brandegee (Mrs. Edward Brandegee)
medium:
Pen and brown ink, black charcoal on cream laid paper
Verso: pen and brown ink
description: Three putti flying: one carrying a fish, one a goose, and the other shooting with bow and arrow at a bird; separate study of a hand and floating drapery in upper left.
name: Drawing
